props.name: offsetX
props.desc: Pattern horizontal offset from object's left/top corner

props.name: offsetY
props.desc: Pattern vertical offset from object's left/top corner

props.name: patternTransform
props.desc: transform matrix to change the pattern, imported from svgs.

props.name: repeat
props.desc: Repeat property of a pattern (one of repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y or no-repeat)

props.name: toObject
props.desc: Returns object representation of a pattern

props.name: toSVG
props.desc: Returns SVG representation of a pattern
